course_description: Students begin by participating in observational experiences in the operating room, cardiovascular catheterization lab, and other critical care environments involving CPB, ECMO, and other support devices, and then transition to engage in supervised practice. Beginner level.
prerequisites: CVP 566 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2553, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 8-10:50a, Instructor: McNair/Williams, Status: Open
